song.englishname: Let Your Voices Rise Like Incense

english.segment1: (Verse). Let our voices rise like incense. Let them be as sweet perfume. Let our praises fill the temple. Hallelujah's ringing ever new
english.segment2: (Chorus). Holy, Holy. Is the Lord Almighty. Holy, Holy. Is the Lord our God
english.segment5: Holy, Holy. Is the Lord our God
